TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IPAddress extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit IPAddress extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址。

span.span: Provides an Internet Protocol (IP) address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含 IP 网络上的计算机的地址。The class contains the address of a computer on an IP network. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询服务器以获取其所支持的系列地址和 IP 地址。The following code example shows how to query a server to obtain the family addresses and the IP addresses it supports. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CPP/ipaddress.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CS/ipaddress.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/VB/ipaddress.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8[] address) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定为 数组的地址初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the address specified as a array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 时， 属性设置为 "`address`"。The is created with the property set to `address`. 如果 `address` 的长度为4， 构造 IPv4 地址;否则，将构造范围为0的 IPv6 地址。If the length of `address` is 4, constructs an IPv4 address; otherwise, an IPv6 address with a scope of 0 is constructed. 假定 数组按网络字节顺序排列，最高有效字节优先于索引位置0。The array is assumed to be in network byte order with the most significant byte first in index position 0.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 包含错误的 IP 地址。

span.span: contains a bad IP address.

param.name: newAddress
param.span: IP 地址的长值。

span.span: The long value of the IP address.

param.span: 例如，大端格式的值 0x2414188f 可能为 IP 地址“143.24.20.36”。

span.span: For example, the value 0x2414188f in big-endian format would be the IP address "143.24.20.36".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 实例时， 属性设置为 "`newAddress`"。The instance is created with the property set to `newAddress`. 假定 值为网络字节顺序。The value is assumed to be in network byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 时， 属性设置为 "`address`"。The is created with the property set to `address`. 如果 `address` 的长度为4，则此方法将构造一个 IPv4 地址;否则，将构造范围为0的 IPv6 地址。If the length of `address` is 4, this method constructs an IPv4 address; otherwise, an IPv6 address with a scope of 0 is constructed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 字段指示 实例必须侦听所有网络接口上的客户端活动。The method uses the field to indicate that a instance must listen for client activity on all network interfaces. 字段等效于以点分隔的四部分表示法中的0.0.0.0。The field is equivalent to 0.0.0.0 in dotted-quad notation.

summary.span: 将值由主机字节顺序转换为网络字节顺序。

span.span: Converts a value from host byte order to network byte order.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int16 HostToNetworkOrder(int16 host) cil managed
Public Shared Function HostToNetworkOrder (host As Short) As Short

param.name: host
param.span: 以主机字节顺序表示的要转换的数字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in host byte order.

summary.span: 将短值由主机字节顺序转换为网络字节顺序。

span.span: Converts a short value from host byte order to network byte order.

returns.span: 以网络字节顺序表示的短值。

span.span: A short value, expressed in network byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的计算机使用不同的约定对多字节整数值中的字节进行排序。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 某些计算机首先放置最重要的字节（称为大字节序顺序），其他计算机首先放置最不重要的字节（称为小字节序顺序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要处理使用不同字节排序的计算机，则通过网络发送的所有整数值都以网络字节顺序发送，该顺序首先具有最重要的字节。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法将主机系统上存储的多字节整数值从主机使用的字节顺序转换为网络使用的字节顺序。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the host to the byte order used by the network.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 HostToNetworkOrder(int32 host) cil managed
Public Shared Function HostToNetworkOrder (host As Integer) As Integer

param.name: host
param.span: 以主机字节顺序表示的要转换的数字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in host byte order.

summary.span: 将整数值由主机字节顺序转换为网络字节顺序。

span.span: Converts an integer value from host byte order to network byte order.

returns.span: 以网络字节顺序表示的整数值。

span.span: An integer value, expressed in network byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的计算机使用不同的约定对多字节整数值中的字节进行排序。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 某些计算机首先放置最重要的字节（称为大字节序顺序），其他计算机首先放置最不重要的字节（称为小字节序顺序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要处理使用不同字节排序的计算机，则通过网络发送的所有整数值都以网络字节顺序发送，该顺序首先具有最重要的字节。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法将主机系统上存储的多字节整数值从主机使用的字节顺序转换为网络使用的字节顺序。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the host to the byte order used by the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的计算机使用不同的约定对多字节整数值中的字节进行排序。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 某些计算机首先放置最重要的字节（称为大字节序顺序），其他计算机首先放置最不重要的字节（称为小字节序顺序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要处理使用不同字节排序的计算机，则通过网络发送的所有整数值都以网络字节顺序发送，该顺序首先具有最重要的字节。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法将主机系统上存储的多字节整数值从主机使用的字节顺序转换为网络使用的字节顺序。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the host to the byte order used by the network.

summary.span: 方法使用 字段指示 必须侦听所有网络接口上的客户端活动。

span.span: The method uses the field to indicate that a must listen for client activity on all network interfaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段等效于冒号十六进制表示法中的0:0:0:0:0:0:0:0，或等于：： in compact 表示法。The field is equivalent to 0:0:0:0:0:0:0:0 in colon-hexadecimal notation, or to :: in compact notation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例以标准压缩格式显示当前主机的任何地址的值。The following code example displays the value of the current host's Any address in standard compressed format. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/CPP/noneanyloopback.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/CS/noneanyloopback.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/VB/noneanyloopback.vb#2)]

[!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/CPP/noneanyloopback.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/CS/noneanyloopback.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6NoneAnyLoopback/VB/noneanyloopback.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsIPv4MappedToIPv6 As Boolean
public: property bool IsIPv4MappedToIPv6 { bool get(); };

summary.span: 了解 IP 地址是否为 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址。

span.span: Gets whether the IP address is an IPv4-mapped IPv6 address.
Returns .

value.span: 如果 IP 地址为 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the IP address is an IPv4-mapped IPv6 address; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双堆栈套接字始终需要 IPv6 地址。Dual-stack sockets always require IPv6 addresses. 与 IPv4 地址进行交互的功能需要使用 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. 所有 IPv4 地址必须以 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式表示，这使得仅支持 IPv6 的应用程序能够与 IPv4 节点通信。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式允许 IPv4 节点的 IPv4 地址表示为 IPv6 地址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 地址编码为 IPv6 地址的低序位32位，高序位96位保存固定前缀0：0：0：0：0： FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. 在 RFC 4291 中指定了 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 有关详细信息，请参阅[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Teredo 地址是前缀为2001::/32 的 IPv6 地址。A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 可以通过正常的 DNS 名称解析来返回 Teredo 地址，或将其枚举为分配给本地接口的 IPv6 地址。Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsLoopback(class System.Net.IPAddress address) cil managed
Public Shared Function IsLoopback (address As IPAddress) As Boolean

param.name: address
param.span: IP 地址。

span.span: An IP address.

summary.span: 指示指定的 IP 地址是否为环回地址。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified IP address is the loopback address.

returns.span: 如果 是环回地址，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is the loopback address; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个 IP 地址相同，则 方法会将 `address` 与 进行比较并返回 `true`。The method compares `address` to and returns `true` if the two IP addresses are the same. 对于 IPv4， 方法将为 127. X 格式的任何 IP 地址返回 `true` （其中，X、Y 和 Z 的范围为0-255），而不只是 （127.0.0.1）。In the case of IPv4, that the method returns `true` for any IP address of the form 127.X.Y.Z (where X, Y, and Z are in the range 0-255), not just (127.0.0.1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来确定指定的地址是否为环回地址。The following code example uses the method to determine whether the specified address is a loopback address. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/CPP/isloopback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/CS/isloopback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/VB/isloopback.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.IPAddress MapToIPv4() cil managed

summary.span: 将 对象映射到 IPv4 地址。

span.span: Maps the object to an IPv4 address.

returns.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: IPv4 地址。

span.span: An IPv4 address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双堆栈套接字始终需要 IPv6 地址。Dual-stack sockets always require IPv6 addresses. 与 IPv4 地址进行交互的功能需要使用 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. 所有 IPv4 地址必须以 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式表示，这使得仅支持 IPv6 的应用程序能够与 IPv4 节点通信。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式允许 IPv4 节点的 IPv4 地址表示为 IPv6 地址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 地址编码为 IPv6 地址的低序位32位，高序位96位保存固定前缀0：0：0：0：0： FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. 在 RFC 4291 中指定了 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 有关详细信息，请参阅[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231). 如果要使用 将 IPv4 地址从 IPv6 格式转换为 IPv4 格式，则必须首先确保已获得 IPv4 地址。If you want to use to convert an IPv4 address from IPv6 format to IPv4 format, you must first ensure that you've got an IPv4 address. 调用 ，如果 IP 地址最初是 IPv4 编写为 IPv6，则返回 `true`，否则返回 `false`。Call , which will return `true` if the IP address is originally IPv4 written as IPv6, or `false` otherwise. 如果 返回 `true`，请使用 进行转换。If returns `true`, use to make the conversion.

returns.span: 返回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双堆栈套接字始终需要 IPv6 地址。Dual-stack sockets always require IPv6 addresses. 与 IPv4 地址进行交互的功能需要使用 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. 所有 IPv4 地址必须以 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式表示，这使得仅支持 IPv6 的应用程序能够与 IPv4 节点通信。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式允许 IPv4 节点的 IPv4 地址表示为 IPv6 地址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 地址编码为 IPv6 地址的低序位32位，高序位96位保存固定前缀0：0：0：0：0： FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. 在 RFC 4291 中指定了 IPv4 映射的 IPv6 地址格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 有关详细信息，请参阅[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231).

summary.span: 将数字由网络字节顺序转换为主机字节顺序。

span.span: Converts a number from network byte order to host byte order.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int16 NetworkToHostOrder(int16 network) cil managed
Public Shared Function NetworkToHostOrder (network As Short) As Short

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: network
param.span: 以网络字节顺序表示的要转换的数字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in network byte order.

summary.span: 将短值由网络字节顺序转换为主机字节顺序。

span.span: Converts a short value from network byte order to host byte order.

returns.span: 以主机字节顺序表示的短值。

span.span: A short value, expressed in host byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的计算机使用不同的约定对多字节整数值中的字节进行排序。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 某些计算机首先放置最重要的字节（称为大字节序顺序），其他计算机首先放置最不重要的字节（称为小字节序顺序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要处理使用不同字节排序的计算机，则通过网络发送的所有整数值都以网络字节顺序发送，该顺序首先具有最重要的字节。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法将主机系统上存储的多字节整数值从网络使用的字节顺序转换为主机使用的字节顺序。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the network to the byte order used by the host. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将短值由网络字节顺序转换为主机字节顺序。The following example uses the method to convert a short value from network byte order to host byte order. [!code-cpp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CPP/ipaddress_networktohost.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CS/ipaddress_networktohost.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/VB/ipaddress_networktohost.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CPP/ipaddress_networktohost.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CS/ipaddress_networktohost.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/VB/ipaddress_networktohost.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 字段指示 不能侦听客户端活动。The method uses the field to indicate that a must not listen for client activity. 字段等效于以点分隔的四部分表示法的255.255.255.255。The field is equivalent to 255.255.255.255 in dotted-quad notation. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性指示不应使用任何网络接口。The following example uses the property to indicate that no network interface should be used. span.span: Converts an IP address represented as a character span to an instance.

span.span: The converted IP address.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Net.IPAddress Parse(string ipString) cil managed
Public Shared Function Parse (ipString As String) As IPAddress

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: ipString
param.span: 包含 IP 地址（IPv4 使用点分四组表示法，IPv6 使用冒号十六进制表示法）的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains an IP address in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 and in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6.

summary.span: 将 IP 地址字符串转换为 实例。

span.span: Converts an IP address string to an instance.

returns.span: 一个 实例。

span.span: An instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态 方法从 IP 地址创建一个 实例，该 IP 地址采用以点分隔的四部分表示法表示的 IPv4，用冒号十六进制表示法表示 IPv6。The static method creates an instance from an IP address expressed in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 and in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6. `ipString` 确定如何构造 IP 地址，则部件数（各部分之间用句点分隔）。The number of parts (each part is separated by a period) in `ipString` determines how the IP address is constructed. 一个部分地址直接存储在网络地址中。A one part address is stored directly in the network address. 两部分寻址，方便于指定 a 类地址，并将前导部分放在第一个字节，并将尾随部分放在网络地址的最右侧三个字节中。A two part address, convenient for specifying a class A address, puts the leading part in the first byte and the trailing part in the right-most three bytes of the network address. 三个部分地址（方便指定 B 类地址）将第一个部分放在第一个字节中，第二个部分位于第二个字节，第二个部分位于网络地址最右侧的两个字节中。A three part address, convenient for specifying a class B address, puts the first part in the first byte, the second part in the second byte, and the final part in the right-most two bytes of the network address. 例如：For example: |部分数量和示例 `ipString`Number of parts and example `ipString`|Ip 地址的 IPv4 地址IPv4 address for IPAddress| |--------------------------------------------|--------------------------------| |1 -- "65535"1 -- "65535"|0.0.255.2550.0.255.255| |2 -- "20.2"2 -- "20.2"|20.0.0.220.0.0.2| |2 -- "20.65535"2 -- "20.65535"|20.0.255.25520.0.255.255| |3 -- "128.1.2"3 -- "128.1.2"|128.1.0.2128.1.0.2| ## Examples 以下代码将包含 IP 地址的字符串转换为 IPv4 的以点分隔的四部分表示法，在 IPv6 中将其转换为 类的实例。The following code converts a string that contains an IP address, in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 or in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6, into an instance of the class. 然后，它使用重载的 方法以标准表示法显示地址。Then it uses the overloaded method to display the address in standard notation. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/CPP/parse.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/CS/parse.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/VB/parse.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 IPv6 地址范围标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the IPv6 address scope identifier.

value.span: 指定地址范围的长整数。

span.span: A long integer that specifies the scope of the address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的意义取决于使用它的上下文。The meaning of changes depending on the context in which it is used. - 链接-本地地址。Link-local address. 在多个接口连接到不同链接的主机上，可以将同一链接本地地址分配给多个接口。On a host with multiple interfaces connected to separate links, the same link-local address can be assigned to multiple interfaces. 为了消除这种不明确性，范围标识符用于指定交换消息所使用的接口。To eliminate this ambiguity, a scope identifier is used to specify the interface over which messages are exchanged. > [!NOTE] > 链接本地地址（由格式前缀（FP） FE80 标识）在与同一链接上的相邻节点通信时由节点使用。Link-local addresses, identified by the Format Prefix (FP) FE80, are used by nodes when communicating with neighboring nodes on the same link. - 站点本地地址。Site-local addresses. 主机可以连接到多个站点。A host can be connected to multiple sites. 在这种情况下，作用域标识符用于指示要与之通信的特定站点。In this case, a scope identifier is used to indicate a specific site to communicate with. > [!NOTE] > 在专用 intranet 上通信时，节点会使用由格式前缀（FP） FEC0 标识的站点本地地址。Site-local addresses, identified by the Format Prefix (FP) FEC0, are used by nodes when communicating on private intranets. 用于指定地址 `ScopeId` 的表示法为 `Address%ScopeId`。The notation that is used to specify the `ScopeId` with an address is `Address%ScopeId`. 例如，`FE80::5EFE:192.168.41.30%2.`For example, `FE80::5EFE:192.168.41.30%2.` ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CPP/ipaddress.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CS/ipaddress.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/VB/ipaddress.vb#3)]

span.span: -or-
> 0x00000000FFFFFFFF

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此方法接受可作为 分析的 ipString 值，然后将该 Int64 视为网络字节顺序的 IP 地址的长值，类似于 构造函数的作用。Note that this method accepts as valid an ipString value that can be parsed as an , and then treats that Int64 as the long value of an IP address in network byte order, similar to the way that the constructor does. 这意味着，如果 Int64 分析成功，则此方法返回 true，即使它表示的地址不是有效的 IP 地址也是如此。This means that this method returns true if the Int64 is parsed successfully, even if it represents an address that's not a valid IP address. 例如，如果 ipString 为 "1"，则此方法返回 true，即使 "1" （或0.0.0.1）不是有效的 IP 地址，也可能希望此方法返回 false。For example, if ipString is "1", this method returns true even though "1" (or 0.0.0.1) is not a valid IP address and you might expect this method to return false. 修复此 bug 会破坏现有应用程序，因此不会更改当前行为。Fixing this bug would break existing apps, so the current behavior will not be changed. 你的代码可以通过确保它只使用此方法来分析以点分隔的十进制格式的 IP 地址，从而避免此行为。Your code can avoid this behavior by ensuring that it only uses this method to parse IP addresses in dotted-decimal format.

span.span: is null.
